company.name: Zerodha
company.short_description: Zerodha is a cloud-based customer relationship management platform that helps businesses manage sales, marketing, and customer support from a single interface.

faqs.a: Zerodha helps businesses streamline their sales, marketing, and customer service operations by keeping all customer data and interactions in one place.
Zerodha is designed for businesses of all sizes—from startups to large enterprises—looking to manage customer relationships effectively.

faqs.q: Does Zerodha offer a free tier?
faqs.a: Yes. Zerodha offers a Free Edition that supports up to 3 users with essential CRM features.

faqs.q: Can Zerodha integrate with other tools?
faqs.a: Yes, Zerodha integrates with tools like Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Slack, Mailchimp, and its own suite of apps.

faqs.q: Is Zerodha suitable for small businesses?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Many small and mid-sized businesses use Zerodha for its affordability and ease of use.
